name: Santas Workshop (Project Christmas)
description:
Use 3 Different Type of Elfs to help collect Presents that are naughty off the conveyor belt.

Elf 1 work for 15 second at a time

Elf 2 work for 10 seconds

Elf 3 work for 5 seconds.

Controls

TIP: hover over the chair and click your LeftMouse Button + a number key below to bring in more Elf's/

ELF 1 - LMB +1

ELF 2 LMB+2

ELF 3  LMB+3
